## Bio

Azaid Ordaz is a student of the undergraduate program on Genomic Sciences in Cuernavaca, Morelos, Mexico. He is interested in fields such as genomics, immunology and virology. He is currently on a research stay at the Mexico's National Institute of Respiratory Diseases, where he is building a Boolean network to study macrophage differentiation..
